caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. A terrified person sat motionless in the snowy field, and nearby, another individual approached him, holding a skull in their hand. Then, there was an animated sequence that resembled a toy castle. This castle kept expanding, and the scene shifted to the person standing in a grassy field, surrounded by cavalry on all sides. Meanwhile, in the castle, some children were practicing archery. Upstairs in the castle, a couple was observing these children. Later, the couple received a report from their subordinates and proceeded to the grassy field, where they killed the fleeing soldier, although they appeared deeply remorseful.
